name: Abipon
name.short: Abipon
name.comp: Abipon
code: axb
family: Guaicuru
country: Argentina
geo: -29.000 -61.000 63
feat: p t c k q m n ɲ ɣ ʁ h ɾ l i i: e e: a a: o o: ə ə:
note: It is uncertain whether the phoneme designated here as a palatal stop /c/ is better represented by a palatal stop /c/ or a post-alveolar affricate /tʃ/.
bib: Najilis, Elena L. 1966. Lengua Abipona. Buenos Aires: Centro de Estudios Linguísticos. 13-20.
